faqs.question: Why did carriers shut down email-to-text gateways?
faqs.answer: Carriers cited security concerns, spam issues, and the shift to modern APIs. The gateways were decades old and increasingly unreliable.

faqs.question: Is this really a drop-in replacement?
faqs.answer: Yes! If your code sends emails to 5551234567@vtext.com, you just change it to your-address@emailtotext.io. The phone number goes in the subject or body.

faqs.question: What about other carriers besides AT&T, Verizon, and T-Mobile?
faqs.answer: We support all major carriers including Sprint, Boost, Cricket, Metro, and 50+ others. International carriers are also supported.

faqs.question: How do I migrate hundreds of phone numbers?
faqs.answer: You can use one email address for all numbers. Just include the destination phone number in your email subject or body.
